file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-23-03-04 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER PRESSURE SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER PRESSURE SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the pressure switch of the baggage- compartment fire-extinguisher bottles. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PRESSURE SWITCH OF THE BAGGAGE- CLASS-C BAGGAGE 26-23-03-000-801-A COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHER COMPARTMENT BOTTLES- REMOVAL PRESSURE SWITCH OF THE BAGGAGE- CLASS-C BAGGAGE 26-23-03-400-801-A COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHER COMPARTMENT BOTTLES- INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-23-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. PRESSURE SWITCH OF THE BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES- REMOVAL A. General (1) For this procedure, it is necessary to remove the fire extinguisher bottles from the aircraft. (2) To do this task, refer to the instructions in the Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high- rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES - RE- AMM TASK 26-23-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 - Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the electronic compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-23-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Put the ladder in the work area. (3) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the electronic compartment. (4) Remove the baggage-compartment fire-extinguisher bottles ( AMM TASK 26-23-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the pressure switch of the baggage-compartment fire-extinguisher bottles. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high-rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-23-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 3. PRESSURE SWITCH OF THE BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES- INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions in the Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high- rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES - INSTAL- AMM TASK 26-23-01-400-801-A/400 LATION Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 - Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the electronic compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT THE "BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG" CIRCUIT BREAKER IS OPEN AND SAFETIED. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 26-23-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Install the pressure switch of the baggage-compartment fire-extinguisher bottles. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high-rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the baggage-compartment fire-extinguishing bottles (AMM TASK 26-23-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (4) Remove the ladder from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 26-23-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
